Für die heute erschienene Neuauflage von 1000 Exempl. „Nyloff'sche Instrumental Tabelle" The third public edition of the Instrumentations-Tabelle was sent to the printers on June 26 and received from them on September 3 (Verlagsdruckbuch UE 1999). tei:translation.tei:p: {recto} [Sender:] [ stamp: ] Universal Edition & Co VIENNA I, Karlsplatz 6, Musikverein Building
[To:] Professor [/] Heinrich Schenker, Esq., Vienna III, Reisnerstraße 38.
{verso} Vienna, September 4, 1917 [ stamp: ] Accounting Department Prof. Heinrich Schenker, Esq., Vienna
We are sending you simultaneously via the Postal Savings Bank the agreed honorarium of:
for the new edition of Niloff Instrumentation Table, in 1,000 copies, published today. In requesting your acknowledgment., we remain,
